title: Best winter coats 2019 that will keep you cosy through the cold months ahead
text:

If you love fashion as much as us, then i'm sure you can agree that the best part of autumn winter (aside from all the holidays) is perfecting your winter wardrobe.

Yep, we're talking cosy knits, the must-have boots, classical denim and of course, a new season coat.

Whether you're the type who just buys one classic coat and wears it with everything, or you like a new coat for every occasion, we've got you covered.

From statement faux fur styles to bold brights, here's our top coat picks...

Bouclé Textures

Want a style that’ll take you from day to night? Chunky bouclé will cosy up your denim, or dress up a pleated skirt.

Shop the look...

Bouclé coat, £89, Principles at Debenhams;

Polo neck, £6, Primark;

Skirt, £25.99, Stradivarius;

Hat, £18, River Island;

Boots, £99.99, Zara

Puffa Magic

This longer-line puffa skims hips and thighs, rather than adding bulk to your middle. Wear with slim-fit bottoms to keep the look sleek.

Shop the look...

Puffa jacket, £99, jumper, £59, and trousers £59, all Autograph at M&S;

Hat, £17.50, and boots £45, both M&S Collection

Country Chic

Wax jackets are super versatile – don’t be afraid to pair them with floral prints and pretty dresses.

Shop the look...

Wax jacket, £99, jumper, £55, and skirt, £49.50, all Per Una at M&S;

Boots, £45, M&S Collection

All White

If darker autumn shades aren’t for you, white is surprisingly versatile and looks chic with winter florals.

Shop the look...

Coat, £150, Monsoon;

Dress, £55, Per Una at M&S

Bag, £12, F&F at Tesco

70s Inspired

Don’t be afraid to try new faux fur colours, as this season black is taking a back seat.

Shop the look...

Coat, £99, Topshop;

Dress, £99, Monsoon;

Boots, £79.99, H&M

Bold Brights

A classic belted coat looks great on pear shapes, as it nips in your middle and accentuates your curves.

Shop the look...

Coat, £99, dress, £69, bag, £19.50, and gloves, £17.50, all M&S Collection;

Loafers, £65, Autograph at M&S
description: Coat season has arrived, and it’s time to warm those cockles. From cuddly puffas to 70s style shearling, there’s a style to suit everyone…
